overall.description: Expand the shape of an array.

axis.description: Position in the expanded axes where the new axis (or axes) is placed.  Deprecated since version 1.13.0: Passing an axis where axis > a.ndim will be treated as axis == a.ndim, and passing axis < -a.ndim - 1 will be treated as axis == 0. This behavior is deprecated.   Changed in version 1.18.0: A tuple of axes is now supported.  Out of range axes as described above are now forbidden and raise an AxisError.

result.description: View of a with the number of dimensions increased.
